alert.note: Alert for Northeastern Yellowstone; Northern Stillwater; Southwestern Yellowstone (Montana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 19 at 9:39AM MDT by NWS Billings
info.description: ...Heavy rianfall will impact portions of northeastern Stillwater and southwestern Yellowstone Counties through 1030 AM MDT... At 934 AM MDT, Doppler radar indicated an area of heavy rain and thunderstorms over the area moving north at 35 mph. HAZARD...Very heavy rainfall. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Minor street flooding should be expected. Motortists may encounter limited visibility in heavy rain to less than a quarter mile as well as ponding of water on roadways. Locations impacted include... Billings, Laurel, Lockwood, Huntley, Shepherd, Billings Heights, Worden, Billings West End, Ballantine, Halfbreed Lake Wildlife, Hailstone Wildlife Refuge, Molt, Acton, Park City and Comanche. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...<30 MPH
info.instruction: Torrential rainfall is expected. Minor street flooding is possible. Ditches and culverts may fill quickly. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.

area.areaDesc: Northeastern Yellowstone; Northern Stillwater; Southwestern Yellowstone
